pli-tv-kd5:2.1.4: sabbamañjiṭṭhikā → sabbamañjeṭṭhikā (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr); sabbamañjaṭṭhikāyo (si)
pli-tv-kd5:2.3.1: khallakabaddhā → … vaddhā (sya-all) | … bandhā (mr); morapiñchaparisibbitā → morapiñjaparisibbitā (bj, sya-all), moraparipiccha (pts-vp-pli1ed)
pli-tv-kd5:4.3.1: agāravā appatissā asabhāgavuttikā → sagāravā sappatissā sabhāgavuttikā (sya-all); sagāravā saggatissā sabhāgavuttikā (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
pli-tv-kd5:5.2.5: pādakhilo vā ābādho → pādakhīlābādho vā (sya-all); pādakhīlā vā ābādho (pts-vp-pli1ed)
pli-tv-kd5:6.3.2: janapadakathaṃ, itthikathaṃ → itthīkathaṃ purisakathaṃ (sya-all); itthikathaṃ purisakathaṃ (mr)
pli-tv-kd5:13.1.1: mahākaccāno → mahākaccāyano (bj); papatake → papāte (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed); pavatte (@ud5.6#1 [Soṇasutta]); kuraraghare → kururaghare (mr)
pli-tv-kd5:13.2.1: () → (evaṃ vutte āyasmā mahākaccāyano soṇaṃ upāsakaṃ kuṭikaṇṇaṃ etadavoca) (sya-all; @ud5.6#1 [Soṇasutta])
pli-tv-kd5:13.6.6: majjārū jantū → majjhāru jantu (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); majjāru jantu (sya-all); majjhārū jantū (mr)
